title: Graphene oxide–cerium oxide nanocomposite modified gold electrode for ultrasensitive detection of chlorpyrifos pesticide
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27862-27872
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04406A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sami Ullah Khan, Waqas Khalid, Muhammad Atif, Zulqurnain Ali
This research introduces a noval method to detect chlorpyrifos (CLP) using a gold electrode coated with a graphene oxide–cerium oxide (GO–CeO2) nanocomposite in a pH 7.0 phosphate buffer solution.
